title: API Keys
description: Your API keys are used to authenticate requests to the Plugged.in API. Each key is assigned to a specific Hub and you can change the Hub assignment anytime using the edit button. Keep your keys secure and do not share them with others.
empty: No API keys yet. Create one to get started.

create.title: Create API Key
create.description: Create a new API key for your project. You can optionally give it a name to help identify its purpose.

delete.title: Delete API Key
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this API key{{name}}? This action cannot be undone.

editHub.title: Edit Hub Assignment
editHub.description: Select which Hub this API key should access. The key will only have access to the selected Hub's servers and resources.

copied.title: API Key copied
copied.description: The API key has been copied to your clipboard.

created.title: API Key created
created.description: Your new API key has been created successfully.

deleted.title: API Key deleted
deleted.description: Your API key has been deleted successfully.

hubUpdated.title: Hub Updated
hubUpdated.description: API key Hub assignment has been updated successfully.
